title.text: Security Update for Office 2003 Multilingual User Interface Pack (KB905645)

description.text: A security vulnerability exists in Microsoft Office Outlook 2003 that could allow arbitrary code to run when opening a maliciously modified email. This update resolves that vulnerability when Outlook 2003 is used with a Multilingual User Interface Pack. In addition, for users of the Korean Multilingual User Interface Pack, this update also resolves a vulnerability in the Korean IME that could allow for elevation of privilege.
